Anyone can contribute to or edit text onto/from With. A lot of comment has no academic value Oat all and IDs personal, biased and researched or value based discussion only. "Lancaster lecturer Dr Catherine Elton says students must develop an ability too analyse the nature of the source material within Wikipedia, adding that the educator should ensure there is "a strong, continuing focus on TH need to support academic work with reference to acceptable scholarly sources" (Easton: Ibid).
